pkgmetadata.longdescription: # infer-licenseHeavily inspired by https://github.com/sol/infer-license/ this will provide anAPI to guess what license a given file represents.```>>> from infer_license import guess_file>>> print(guess_file("LICENSE"))License(name='MIT License', shortname='MIT', trove_classifier='License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License')>>> guess_file("setup.py")None```There's also a handy `infer_license` script that takes a filename.```$ infer_license LICENSELICENSE: MIT```# Licenseinfer-license is copyright [Tim Hatch](http://timhatch.com/), and licensed underthe MIT license.
